startFlow

void startFlow(File jarPath,
               String className,
               Map<String,String> userArgs)
Starts a Flow.

Parameters:
jarPath - Path to the Flow Jar.
className - Flow ClassName that needs to be started.
userArgs - Map of User Runtime Arguments that can be accessed in the Flow.
